DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether supplementation oral vitamin D ( cholecalciferol ) improve metabolic parameter patient moderate severe psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Metabolic Parameters Patients With Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis moderate severe psoriasis . Being treated methotrexate stable dos al least 1 month . Phototherapy within past 2 month . History psoriatic arthritis , rheumatoid arthritis , type 1 diabetes mellitus inflammatory bowel disease . Use vitamin supplement fish oil supplement past 2 month . Use hypolipidemic drug , hypoglycemic drug , glucose sensitizer , oral corticosteroid , orlistat , cholestyramine , phenobarbital phenytoin within past 2 month . Pregnancy lactation .
